p: To investigate changes in the global composition of microbiome (β-diversity) PERMANOVA was used to identify variables that had a significant effect on β-diversity (Table 1). Tests were conducted using adonis2 function in vegan v 2.5.3 ( https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=vegan). P-values were generated by 99,999 permutations which caps at P < 1E − 5 as highest significance.
